name: checkwise
description: Generate dynamic Pull Request checklists based on changed file paths using declarative YAML configuration

scripts.build: ncc build src/main.ts -o dist --minify --no-source-map-register && node -e "const fs=require('fs'),path=require('path'); console.log('Files before rename:', fs.readdirSync('dist')); if(fs.existsSync('dist/index.js')){fs.renameSync('dist/index.js','dist/main.js');} const files=fs.readdirSync('dist'); console.log('Files after rename:', files); const mapFiles=files.filter(f=>f.endsWith('.map')||f.endsWith('.d.ts')||f.endsWith('.d.ts.map')); console.log('Map files to remove:', mapFiles); mapFiles.forEach(f=>{try{fs.unlinkSync(path.join('dist',f)); console.log('Removed:', f)}catch(e){console.log('Failed to remove:', f, e.message)}}); console.log('Final files:', fs.readdirSync('dist'))"
scripts.build:check: npm run build && node -e "const fs=require('fs'); const files=fs.readdirSync('dist'); const maps=files.filter(f=>f.endsWith('.map')); if(maps.length>0){console.error('❌ Source maps found:',maps); process.exit(1);} console.log('✅ Build verification passed - no source maps')"
scripts.release: npm run test && npm run build:check

author: inciarmors
